Description: When user enters an invalid password, the system does not display the correct error message
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click 'Login'
Expected Result: Error message 'Invalid username or password' should appear

Description: The system allows registration even when the email is already registered
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Registration page
2. Enter existing email
3. Click 'Register'
Expected Result: Error message 'Email already exists' should appear

Description: When search keyword has no results, system does not show the 'No results found' message
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Search page
2. Enter keyword with no matches
3. Click 'Search'

Description: System allows login button click without input and gives unclear response
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Login page
2. Leave username and password empty
3. Click 'Login'
Expected Result: Error message 'Please enter username and password' should appear

Bug Title: Special characters in search cause error
Description: System crashes or shows incorrect behavior when special characters entered
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Search page
2. Enter @#$% in search
3. Click 'Search'
